Air Quality Index (AQI) is increasing day by day and the impact is affecting the climate a lot. The change in the weather condition has worsened air quality.

• Air is the Earth's atmosphere. Air around us is a mixture of many gases and dust particles. It is the clear gas in which living things live and breathe. It has an indefinite shape and volume. It has no colour or smell. It has mass and weight, because it is matter. The weight of air creates atmospheric pressure. There is no air in outer space. 
• Air is a mixture of about 78% nitrogen, 21% oxygen, 0.9% argon, 0.04% carbon dioxide, and very small amounts of other gases.
• Air can be polluted by some gases (such as carbon monoxide), smoke, and ash. This air pollution causes various problems including smog, acid rain and global warming. It can damage people's health.
• The Air Quality data sources varies depending on the cities.



PLACES:

Providing below gases information in Air using this app: - CO (Carbon Oxide) 
- NO2 (Nitrogen dioxide)

- T 
- W
- WG 
- H (Hydrogen)
- DEW (Hydrocarbon Dew)



AQI LEVELS DEFINITION:

• Green: AQI (0 - 50) | Good
Air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk

• Yellow: AQI	(51 -100) | Moderate
Air quality is acceptable; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.

• Orange: AQI	(101-150) | Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups
Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected.

• Red: AQI (151-200) | Unhealthy
Everyone may begin to experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects

• Purple: AQI (201-300)	| Very Unhealthy
Health warnings of emergency conditions. The entire population is more likely to be affected.

• Brown: AQI 300+	| Hazardous
Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects

WIND ANIMATION
The Ventusky application solves weather displaying in an interesting way. Wind is displayed using streamlines which clearly portray the continuous development of weather. Airflow on Earth is always in motion and the streamlines depict this motion in an amazing way. This makes the interconnection of all atmospheric phenomena obvious.

WEATHER FORECAST
Weather forecast for the first three days is available in the app in one-hour steps. For other days, it’s available in three-hour steps. Users can also look up sunrise and sunrise times in a given place or air quality.

WEATHER MODELS
Thanks to the Ventusky application, visitors get data directly from the numerical models that, just a few years ago, were used solely by meteorologists. The app collects data from the most accurate numerical models. Besides the well-known data from the American GFS and HRRR models, it also displays data from the Canadian GEM model and the German ICON model, which is unique thanks to its high resolution for the whole world. Two models, EURAD and USRAD, are based on current radar and satellite readings. These models are able to show precisely current precipitation in US and Europe.

WEATHER FRONTS
You can also display weather fronts. We have created a neural network that predicts the positions of cold, warm, occluded, and stationary fronts based on data from weather models. This algorithm is unique, and we are the first on the world who makes global fronts forecast available to users.

summary.label:
LastQuake is a free, mobile application dedicated to alerting populations and gathering testimonies in real-time when an earthquake occurs. Designed by seismologists,  LastQuake is the official app of the Euro-Mediterranean Seismological Center (EMSC). Thanks to the participative action of its users, only a few minutes are needed for the EMSC to estimate earthquake effects and notify the population.

[LastQuake is an ad-free app!]


** AN INNOVATIVE EARTHQUAKE DETECTION METHOD **
EMSC detects earthquakes using:

∘ Earthquake witnesses, who are the first to feel an earthquake, hence the first informed that an event is happening.

∘ Internet and mobile technologies, which allow rapid information collection of the effects observed by witnesses, who are asked to fill in a questionnaire and share photos and videos.

Want to learn more about our detection system? Watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sNCaHFxhZ5E



** COMMITMENT TO POPULATIONS AFFECTED BY EARTHQUAKES **

Information and communication are cornerstones in preventing risky behaviors. EMSC contributes to the reduction of seismic risk by providing you with:

∘ real-time information

∘ post-earthquake safety tips

∘ SMS service that allows victims to notify their loved ones.



** YOUR INVOLVEMENT MATTERS **

LastQuake is a citizen science project. Your contribution helps refine our understanding of earthquake effects while fostering our support in disaster preparation and response.



** KEY FEATURES **

∘ Real-time information and data

∘ Customizable notifications (destructive earthquakes, earthquakes near you)

∘ Access to comments, photos, and videos by eyewitnesses

∘ Information-sharing via social media

∘ SMS service to notify loved ones when in the area impacted by an earthquake

∘ Post-earthquake safety tips



** WHAT'S NEW ** 

∘ Interactive felt map

∘ Customizable notification test

∘ Earthquake notification through voice synthesizer 

∘ Copy-paste available for comments

∘ Minor bugs fixed

∘ New languages available: Croatian, Czech, Bosnian, Montenegrin, Hebrew



** WHAT IS EMSC? **

EMSC is an international non-profit scientific NGO founded in 1975. Based in France, EMSC federates data from the seismological observatories of 86 institutes from 57 countries. While operating a real-time earthquake information service, EMSC advocates for public participation in scientific research. Its core product, LastQuake, paves the way for innovative approaches to building more disaster-resilient communities, making EMSC among the pioneers of disaster apps dedicated to earthquakes and tsunamis.

summary.label:
Welcome to the world’s best journal for waterfowl hunting!
This app could possibly be the best investment you will ever make towards your success in hunting waterfowl.
We at Hunt Proof have created a waterfowl journal that is not only detail-oriented, but it is also searchable! All the data you collect over years of hunting can now be saved and searched by the specific criteria that you choose. Search your past successful hunts by management area, weather parameters, lake levels, river stages, hide type, and more.
Hunt Proof was created to make precious time in the field more effective and more efficient. Successful hunts in the past offer information on how to set up a future hunt. You’ll notice trends on how birds act in your region in different weather patterns. Your previous hunts provide valuable information that allows you to recreate success time and time again. We at Hunt Proof believe that waterfowl are creatures of habit and, with the right information, the bird’s locations can be predicted.
Key Functions:
Predictor
Previous experience coupled with scientific studies have allowed us to create an algorithm that will give the hunter the ability to effectively and efficiently decide when to take to the field. In fact, the migration predictor will give every day a score based on a multitude of parameters to predict the best day for harvesting birds. These 15-day predictor scores help hunters plan the most opportune time to plan their hunt. Life is busy, and we believe that time is valuable. Make the most of your hunt!
Hunt Log
We call this the meat and potatoes of the app. The hunt log stores all the information from previous hunts. 21 categories of searchable criteria make up each hunt entry, including weather and GPS location, that populate automatically but can still be edited, all the way to a note section where you can record the hilarious memory when your buddy goes a little too deep in his waders or when a new waterfowler harvests his first bird. At Huntproof, we want you to have a successful hunt, but we also want you to remember the details of those hunts for years to come! There’s even a photo upload section that allows you to upload up to 15 photos for each entry. Take pictures of your spread, the hide, the bird pile, the dog, but most importantly, the smiles from an enjoyable day in the field. You can view these logs easily, in list form or from a calendar view.
My Tags and License
In the Tags and License section, you can upload digital copies of all of your licenses and permits You’ll have no problem proving you are legal.
State Regulations
Hunt Proof doesn’t just help keep you legal in having your documents organized, but you can also find all of your state’s regulations in the same place. No more wondering what the current limits are or if they changed from last year. We’ve done the work for you. Just click on the state you are hunting in and you’ll be forwarded straight to the regulations page of whatever management agency that oversees waterfowl in that specific state. You can also be directed to other online resources where you can purchase licenses and stamps as well as aeriel waterfowl surveys.
Yearly Harvest
As hunters we strive to improve our hunts year after year. Hunt Proof uses all of those logged hunting experiences to help make future hunts more successful. Hunters will be able to look back over the number of hunts and successful bird harvests they’ve had each season. Spend less time searching skies for flights that never come, and use previous experience to help find the ideal times to take the field.
North American Waterfowl Grand Slam
There are 41 species of waterfowl found in North America. The goal of the grand slam is to harvest every single one. Hunt Proof makes it easy. Simply tap the image of each species as you harvest it, and Hunt Proof checks it off the list for you. It’s the ultimate waterfowler’s bucket list!

An air quality index (AQI) is a number used by government agencies to communicate to the public how polluted the air is currently or how polluted it is forecast to become.Different countries also use different names for their indices such as Air Quality Health Index, Air Pollution Index and Pollutant Standards Index.

Different countries have their own air quality indices which are not all consistent.iAirQuality used to convert from all countries's air pollutant concentration to AQI varies by pollutant, Air quality index values are divided into ranges by  App, and each range is assigned a descriptor and a color code. Standardized public health advisories are associated with each AQI range

If you are looking for an APP to monitor city's Air Quality - iAirQuality is the best choice for you.
